title: How to get more upvotes then downvotes in this part of forums?
body:
How to get more upvotes then downvotes in this part of forums?
Ohh, and I have inted in 6 ranked games now and ruined them.. riot does nothing. Noone does anything becuase noone cares what so ever... <- Maybe that is a good reason and a resonable reason why this agame is dying/dead?

replies.body:
The _Player Behavior_ boards are not a place to be if you're wanting to farm upvotes. This subboard is meant for discussing individual player behavior, discussing the behavioral systems in League of Legends (IFS, Leaverbuster, Honor), and helping players to better understand their punishments.

Upvotes and downvotes, in point of fact, don't matter here. The point of this subboard is for discussion, not trying to accrue agreement/disagreement points.

> [{quoted}](name=Umbral Regent,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HPNH5NRA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-12-17T02:02:59.828+0000)
>
> The _Player Behavior_ boards are not a place to be if you're wanting to farm upvotes. This subboard is meant for discussing individual player behavior, discussing the behavioral systems in League of Legends (IFS, Leaverbuster, Honor), and helping players to better understand their punishments.
> 
> Upvotes and downvotes, in point of fact, don't matter here. The point of this subboard is for discussion, not trying to accrue agreement/disagreement points.

So that is what its called "farm upvotes" ... now I undestand the behavior of some of your customers.
What do you get for upvotes ?Have anyone got laid because they had x number of upvotes?

I find it strange that people come here with their problems.. and the forum moderators and users are trying to poke fun at them <- Why would you want to reform and better yourself with this kind of behavior towards you?

> [{quoted}](name=MuteAllFromStart,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HPNH5NRA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-12-17T02:07:42.729+0000)
>
> So that is what its called "farm upvotes" ... now I undestand the behavior of some of your customers.
> What do you get for upvotes ?Have anyone got laid because they had x number of upvotes?
> 
> I find it strange that people come here with their problems.. and the forum moderators and users are trying to poke fun at them <- Why would you want to reform and better yourself with this kind of behavior towards you?

You're the one who brought up attempts to get more upvotes in your OP, not Umbral.

If you think the game is dying/dead, what are you doing on the boards? Why are you still playing the game? If you're here to only troll then you're the problem. Asking why the game is dying when you're actively trying to ruin games is dishonest concern.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HPNH5NRA,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-12-17T02:19:16.403+0000)
>
> You're the one who brought up attempts to get more upvotes in your OP, not Umbral.
> 
> If you think the game is dying/dead, what are you doing on the boards? Why are you still playing the game? If you're here to only troll then you're the problem. Asking why the game is dying when you're actively trying to ruin games is dishonest concern.

No not really. Here is my topic: How to get more upvotes then downvotes in this part of forums?
Ohh, and I have inted in 6 ranked games now and ruined them.. riot does nothing. Noone does anything becuase noone cares what so ever... <- Maybe that is a good reason and a resonable reason why this agame is dying/dead?

I answer questions if you do... you know I like to be treated fairly, so how old are you?

> [{quoted}](name=MuteAllFromStart,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HPNH5NRA,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-12-17T02:23:36.007+0000)
>
> No not really. Here is my topic: How to get more upvotes then downvotes in this part of forums?

And there is where you brought up attempts to get more upvotes.

> Ohh, and I have inted in 6 ranked games now and ruined them.. riot does nothing. 

And there is where you claimed to have trolled.
 
> I answer questions if you do... you know I like to be treated fairly, so how old are you?

I am 30. Considering that question has nothing to do with the topic or the game, it's also a completely inappropriate question. Your concept of "fairly" is pretty lackluster.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HPNH5NRA,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-12-17T02:28:22.103+0000)
>
> And there is where you brought up attempts to get more upvotes.
> 

No not really. I asked how to get more upbotes then downvotes... not just upvotes. Its relative

> And there is where you claimed to have trolled.
> 

What is "trolled" ? <-

> I am 30. Considering that question has nothing to do with the topic or the game, it's also a completely inappropriate question. Your concept of "fairly" is pretty lackluster.


Great! IT has everything to do with  this topic and this game <- I even made threads about that discussing it.
Its important that you understand htat just becuase you think or say something doesnt make it true.
Tell me that gravity doesnt exist <- and then try to fly... go ahead and try mate.

I see you downvoted me, so I upvoted you and downvoted myself too.

Also, there is already a thread about the topic you talking about.

> [{quoted}](name=MuteAllFromStart,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HPNH5NRA,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-12-17T02:34:06.524+0000)
>
> No not really. I asked how to get more upbotes then downvotes... not just upvotes. Its relative

In order to get more upvotes than downvotes, you have to get upvotes. Sounds like a sorry attempt to move goalposts when you got called out.

> What is "trolled" ? <-

In the context of league of legends games, trolling is an intentional effort to ruin someone's game. Thus, intentional feeding is a form of trolling.

You claimed to have intentionally fed.

> Great! IT has everything to do with  this topic and this game <- I even made threads about that discussing it.
> Its important that you understand htat just becuase you think or say something doesnt make it true.
> Tell me that gravity doesnt exist <- and then try to fly... go ahead and try mate.

So my age... "has everything to do with this topic and this game"?

Yeah. You're not here for reasonable discussion. You were likely banking on me not answering that personal question so that you can act offended that I wasn't being "fair".
"Why is everyone shouting at me? BTW, I kicked a puppy today."

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HPNH5NRA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-12-17T02:52:04.460+0000)
>
> "Why is everyone shouting at me? BTW, I kicked a puppy today."

You said I kicked a puppy, so guess I kicked a puppy today.

Typically these topics get great upvote ratios;

* Discussion that offers great insight, solutions, and drawbacks.
* Appologies
* Positive shout outs
* Honor level up posts and encouraging others to be honorable
* Actual false punishments; typically related to being hacked

If you are looking to get upvotes on replies;

* Clear concise, unbiased explainations about the system

Also, you can pray that the discord vote manipulators agree with your contents.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HPNH5NRA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-12-17T03:21:09.784+0000)
>
> Typically these topics get great upvote ratios;
> 
> * Discussion that offers great insight, solutions, and drawbacks.
> * Appologies
> * Positive shout outs
> * Honor level up posts and encouraging others to be honorable
> * Actual false punishments; typically related to being hacked
> 
> If you are looking to get upvotes on replies;
> 
> * Clear concise, unbiased explainations about the system
> 
> Also, you can pray that the discord vote manipulators agree with your contents.

and what about the stuff that gets downvoted?
Looking at player behavior board... everyone but 1 thread are downvoted(?)
And ofc I help people downvote my comment

Anything that;

* complains about upvotes and downvotes
* complaints about how Riot systems suck when they don't understand the system
* says they did nothing wrong when in truth they just can't identify what they did wrong
* threatens to sue (actually, I think people will upvote that, cos it's hilarious)
* complaints that trolls are rampant when it's probably them misidentifying what a troll is
* great walls of text
* pissed off the discord vote manipulators
* anything else that goes into the PB bingo sheet

You can question them. 

But there is a difference between questioning the case on hand and questioning the character of the person replying to them, and you have to make it very distinct and tone of writing matters. 

It also makes a major difference if you are going to discuss something but don't understand the full facts (like how you assumed  Umbral Regent is a Rioter by calling out how he treats his "customers", implying that he works for Riot when he's just a regular player who volunteers his time to answer questions about PB). If you can write your discussion with proper facts and without being biased, then you won't get downvoted. 

Remember the first point about how to get upvotes is to have a discussion that offers great insight, solutions, and drawbacks. When your facts are not straight,  your solutions would be skewed.

But since you are complaining about being downvoted,  you are sure to get downvoted.

To be frank though, if no one wants to discuss anything in PB, then it's a great thing. That means everyone understands what they did wrong and there is no longer a need for us experienced PBer to explain anything, and Riot would have done a great job in combatting disruptive behavior.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HPNH5NRA,comment-id=00030000000000000000,timestamp=2019-12-17T04:35:12.347+0000)
>
> You can question them. 
> 
> But there is a difference between questioning the case on hand and questioning the character of the person replying to them, and you have to make it very distinct and tone of writing matters. 
> 
> It also makes a major difference if you are going to discuss something but don't understand the full facts (like how you assumed  Umbral Regent is a Rioter by calling out how he treats his "customers", implying that he works for Riot when he's just a regular play who volunteers his time to answer questions about PB). If you can write your discussion with proper facts and without being biased, then you won't get downvoted. 
> 
> Remember the first point about how to get upvotes is to have a discussion that offers great insight, solutions, and drawbacks. When your facts are not straight,  your solutions would be skewed.
> 
> But since you are complaining about being downvoted,  you are sure to get downvoted.
> 
> To be frank though, if no one wants to discuss anything in PB, then it's a great thing. That means everyone understands what they did wrong and there is no longer a need for us experienced PBer to explain anything.

Yes ofc you can question them... but who are "them" ? They will never pop out and tell you "hey I downvoted your content because ..." <- SO to question something that wont interact with you in any way other then trying to hurt your content is rather pointless.

Thing is, text only have 1 tone... its text. there is no way you can put a volume setting or accent in textform, maybe a few frazes .. but then it turns in to racism? 

Nowhere did I make the claim that Umbral is a rioter... I dont know if you know this, but Im actuall veteran of these boards and I have interacted with about every moderator here... I know none of them are rioters <- Because I have spoken to all of them... So you accuse me of assuming.. but I didnt, and you assumed... How should we do this? Should I just agree with the false statements you made or how you wanna do this?
I mean, if I were you I would apologize for making false assumptions based on nothing but my own feelings <- But that is me, an old man who was taught by his father to treat others with respect and own my misstakes.

I have tried to make those threads you talk about.. all of them got downvoted.

Or it means that they have given up trying to talk to people here due to the level of assumptions based on feelings... like you did previously, or when I came here 3 years ago with a legit log... and people assumed the worst about me, none of it was true <- So again, how do we deal with this?

> [{quoted}](name=MuteAllFromStart,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HPNH5NRA,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-12-17T04:47:14.527+0000)
>
> Yes ofc you can question them... but who are "them" ? They will never pop out and tell you "hey I downvoted your content because ..." <- SO to question something that wont interact with you in any way other then trying to hurt your content is rather pointless.
> 

Them is who you want to have a discussion with. Some will voice their opinions, some won't bother voicing it cos others have already voiced it. If they aren't interested in a discussion,  then you are just talking to yourself. So just ignore those that aren't looking to have a discussion. 





> Thing is, text only have 1 tone... its text. there is no way you can put a volume setting or accent in textform, maybe a few frazes .. but then it turns in to racism? 

You can certainly control your tone of writing with the different words you chose. 

* one can post things and never be downvoted
- while your posts will always be downvoted.

The circular bullet phrase is a general possibility phrase while the horizontal bullet can make you feel personally attacked. The difference is using YOU as a targetting pronounce rather than using ONE as a general pronounce.  

One can change their writing from an opinion based statement to a factual based statement, by adding feeling adjectives; you feel that there are many trolls in my games and there are many trolls in the game, mean the same thing, but project a different scenario you are trying to portray. 


> 
> Nowhere did I make the claim that Umbral is a rioter... I dont know if you know this, but Im actuall veteran of these boards and I have interacted with about every moderator here... I know none of them are rioters <- Because I have spoken to all of them... So you accuse me of assuming.. but I didnt, and you assumed... How should we do this? Should I just agree with the false statements you made or how you wanna do this?



So. Let me purposely go on the attack and ask what you meant by the below statement.

> [{quoted}](name=MuteAllFromStart,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HPNH5NRA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-12-17T02:07:42.729+0000)
>
>  ... now I undestand the behavior of some of your customers.

In these boards, we are only customers to Riot. So naturally I would assume that you are assuming someone is related to Riot. Of course, if that's not what you meant, then I apologize for misunderstanding you. It co ui ld just be a wrong interpretation of the choice of words. 


> when I came here 3 years ago with a legit log... and people assumed the worst about me, none of it was true <- So again, how do we deal with this?

Firstly, what are you trying to do with your post? Are you looking for help to identify what is wrong with your logs? Or Are you trying claiming you didn't do anything wrong? Are you just trying to get upvotes ... cos of .. reasons? Is your tone of writing and choice of words reflecting about the purpose of post? Have you properly understood how the system works before making a statement? Is your post free of biased and uses facts for back up? All those play a part on getting a proper discussion going.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HPNH5NRA,comment-id=0003000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-12-17T05:27:13.819+0000)
>
> Them is who you want to have a discussion with. Some will voice their opinions, some won't bother voicing it cos others have already voiced it. If they aren't interested in a discussion,  then you are just talking to yourself. So just ignore those that aren't looking to have a discussion. 

I disagree and I never seen it, feel free to show me where anyone of them will voice their opinion, it wont happen, it has never happened before and it will not happen in the future. <- Its part of human nature.

> 
> You can certainly control your tone of writing with the different words you chose. 
> 
> * one can post things and never be downvoted
> - while your posts will always be downvoted.
> 
> The circular bullet phrase is a general possibility phrase while the horizontal bullet can make you feel personally attacked. The difference is using YOU as a targetting pronounce rather than using ONE as a general pronounce.  
> 

I have no idea what you are trying to tell me... I dont use guns, I dont shoot guns. I dont like guns nor do I like stuff related to guns... Like bullet, if that is what you are talking about

> One can change their writing from an opinion based statement to a factual based statement, by adding feeling adjectives; you feel that there are many trolls in my games and there are many trolls in the game, mean the same thing, but project a different scenario you are trying to portray. 
> 
> 

I dont want to use feelings or opinion based statements, I try to use facts and be as un-bias as I can. <- This is what I aim for.

> 
> So. Let me purposely go on the attack and ask what you meant by the below statement.
> 

Go ahead, I have about 30 year experience of this.

> In these boards, we are only customers to Riot. So naturally I would assume that you are assuming someone is related to Riot. Of course, if that's not what you meant, then I apologize for misunderstanding you. It co ui ld just be a wrong interpretation of the choice of words. 
> 

Thank you for the apologt and understnading that you did assume, I didnt <- You are one of very few people who can admit when they are wrong... and to be honest, that wasn't much of an attack. If you want to look what attacks looks like, play a game of lol with me and watch the other 3 players in our team go to town!

> Firstly, what are you trying to do with your post? Are you looking for help to identify what is wrong with your logs? Or Are you trying claiming you didn't do anything wrong? Are you just trying to get upvotes ... cos of .. reasons? Is your tone of writing and choice of words reflecting about the purpose of post? Have you properly understood how the system works before making a statement? Is your post free of biased and uses facts for back up? All those play a part on getting a proper discussion going.

Okey, same goes here then: How old are you? <- I believe in fair treatment.

* Bullet points are the things that create a list. 
* Got nothing to do with guns. 
* it's the dots infront of my sentences right now. 

I still don't now what you mean when you replied to Umbral Regent and said that you now "undestand the behavior of some of your customers".

I'm 35. Not sure what age has to do with anything in regards to the discussion.

I have a feeling that theres some language barrier that is making our communication more difficult and words are being interpreted differently. Just lost in translation things.
Lol caring about up/down votes is kinda pathetic imo.

I totally agree... but when I tell people that , I get punished by forum crew. At least you and me are on the same page
